data.title: Home
data.meta_description:
Nevada R-V Schools811 W. Hickory StreetNevada, MO  64772417-448-2000417-448-2006 Fax
Dr. Tyson Beshore,Superintendent
Mrs. Jodie McNeley,Assistant Superintendent
data.text:
Mission: The mission of the Nevada R-5 School District is to empower, inspire and elevate students with the knowledge and skills necessary for success.

Vision: The vision of the Nevada R-5 School District is to become a leader of educational excellence by providing innovative opportunities for students to maximize their potential.

Motto:

Learning Today...Leading Tomorrow...Together!

At Nevada R-5 we believe:

students and staff deserve a safe, respectful learning environment.

in recruiting and retaining qualified, motivated and innovative educators.

collaborative community relationships are vital to our success.

in responsible stewardship of district resources.

in providing educational experiences that meet the needs of all students.

Senate Bill 368 required the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education to create a website about the trauma-informed schools initiative that includes information for schools and parents. Further, the law requires that each school provide the address of the website, created by DESE, to "all parents of the students in its district." The address is: http://motraumaschools.com
